<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/74847</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74847</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>59b19402-2b12-4e8d-8303-c35365bb9a04#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az erdők szintezettsége</string>
            <string language="en">Levelling of forests</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planieren der Wälder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mise à niveau des forêts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nivelar das florestas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Livellamento delle foreste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισοπέδωση των δασών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nivelación de bosques</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az erdők szintezettségét szemléltető rajz (növények és állatok)</string>
            <string language="en">Picture demonstrating the levelling of forests (plants and animals)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szintezettség,  borz,  mókus,  mérsékeltövi erdő,  </string>
            <string language="en">levelling, badger, squirrel, temperate forest</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung, die das Planieren der Wälder zeigt 
(Betriebe und Tiere)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Image démontrant la mise à niveau des forêts 
(usines et animaux)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrato que demonstra nivelar das florestas 
(plantas e animais)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagine che dimostra il livellamento delle 
foreste (piante ed animali)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα που καταδεικνύει την ισοπέδωση των δασών (φυτά
και ζώα)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadro que demuestra la nivelación de bosques 
(plantas y animales)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planieren, Dachs, Eichhörnchen, mäßiger Wald</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nivelant, blaireau, écureuil, forêt tempérée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">nivelando, texugo, esquilo, floresta temperate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">livellando, tasso, scoiattolo, foresta temperata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ισοπέδωση, ασβός, σκίουρος, συγκρατημένο δάσος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">nivelando, tejón, ardilla, bosque templado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74847</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
